subject: FW: Code not working after upgrading to 1.6 from 1.4
msgSnippet: Can anyone see a problem with the following code segment? It worked with httpunit release1.4 now the call getTableWithID returns null, and none of the code has
messageBody:
Can anyone see a problem with the following code segment?

It worked with httpunit release1.4 now the call getTableWithID returns
null, and none of the code has changed.



====== code segment ====

try

{

WebTable defaultLOCtbl =
currentPage.getTableWithID("DefaultLocationRow");

String defaultName = defaultLOCtbl.getTableCell(1,0).asText();



WebLink link = currentPage.getLinkWith(defaultName);

resp = link.click();

HTTPUnitHelper.doBasicResponseChecking(resp, "System
Administration : Properties");

}

catch(Exception ex)

{

AppTestUtil.processException(ex);

}

return resp;



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
